spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent spatial translation. Room placements and wall alignments are highly accurate to the source. Door swings and window placements match the blueprint meticulously.

structural_fidelity.notes: The 3D model maintains all structural adjacencies. The pantry 'island' and the central staircase are correctly positioned. There are no missing rooms, though the exterior door in the playroom lacks the secondary swing arc depth shown in the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture elements like the kitchen islands, sinks, and seating are well-mapped. Scale is consistent with the architectural proportions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric projection with clean geometry and soft, natural lighting. The color-coding helps differentiate zones without obscuring architectural detail.

detected_errors.description: Minor misalignment of the dining table relative to the exact center of the dining bay shown in the floor plan.
The foyer closet door swing in the 3D render is simplified compared to the double-hinge representation in the 2D plan.
